text:
Urbana, Illinois
December 26, 1952
To: Oraydon Ausmus, ^resident
From: Frank E. Schooley, Treasurer
Re. A number of things.
1. Check for Mrs. Evans et al enclosed.
la. I agree, in future lat's have them submitted on separate
bills, where two or more are Involved, It will be better for
the individuals concerned.
lb. In the future, will you please initial to indicate I
should pay, I think it would look better in the records
when books are audited.
2. I've checked on that note you forwarded to me regarding
Alabama's network assessment. Our bursar says payment
has been jaade. I guess oheck has even cleared by now.
3. Regarding the interim, my thoughts were your thoughts, or
your thoughts were my thoughts. And, Miles is In complete
agreement. From that point all set,
4. m, Extension 2779 also can be used to reach Schooley,
An extenstion of the extension is now located in my second
floor office, along with buzzer â€” both ways. We've already
used to advantage.
5. Happy New fear to you, sir!
Regards,
Frank E. Schooley
The Office holder
fes/fes
P. 8. (6) fee, January 8 and 9 are o.k. by me for meeting
of the NAEB Executive Committee.
